com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.transforms

Class CopyTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.Transformer
      • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.transforms.CopyTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CopyAdjacentTransformer, MoveTransformer

    public class CopyTransformer
extends Transformer
    This transform copies nodes from a source location to one or more target locations. The copied nodes can be placed before or after the target node as siblings or appended as a child to the target node. The transform accommodates 1:1, 1:N, N:1 and N:M source to target node(s) copies.
    Author:
    jcharles

      • hasResetableIds

        protected boolean hasResetableIds(org.w3c.dom.NodeList nodes)
        This method determines if a source selection of nodes, to be copied to a target node, contains Folder or Document level nodes. If Folder or Document levels nodes are copied their Ids need to be re-computed.
        Parameters:
        nodes - Node list
        Returns:
        Boolean flag to indicate the nodes require their ids to be reset

      • isValidOperation

        public boolean isValidOperation(java.lang.String srcClass,
                                java.lang.String targetClass,
                                TaskType operation)
                         throws org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions.InvalidOperationException
        This method defines all the rules driving what is allowed when copying content from source node(s) to a target node.
        Specified by:
        isValidOperation in interface ITransform
        Overrides:
        isValidOperation in class Transformer
        Parameters:
        srcClass - - Source class
        targetClass - - Target class
        operation - The type of operation (TaskType) to be performed: Insert before/after or Append as a child
        Returns:
        boolean - Flag indicating if this operation is allowed.
        Throws:
        org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions.InvalidOperationException - - Thrown if the operation is not allowed.
